Argravour Class Light Escort (Military Starship)

The Argravour was built by a planetary navy in the Gvurrdon sector as an experiment in the application of defensive technology to small vessels. Not particularly successful, it was sold to a corsair band following the trial. The power plant is typically run at 15% of the maximum power, which allows full life support and 1-G maneuver.
